about_the_game:
Greetings!
Welcome to the SSGMC - Solar System Gold Mining Corp.
Now you're part of our family - colony 26168.
Your name is - Prisoner N57691.
Your task - participation in correctional work in the Oort cloud.
You're going to mine a gold! Gold from asteroids.
You will be given a spacesuit and a gun, but do not try to violate regime.
You will be sent into space without a spacesuit. And without a gun.
There is a lot of pirates in each region.
You have to destroy them all before you can return.
For this work you will get the money. Some of them you can spend on improving your equipment.
After release, you can spend it on alcohol and whores, as you wish.
We will give you a room on the space station with good views of the Neptune.
Work hard and you do not even notice how fast time will slip away!
detailed_description:
Greetings!
Welcome to the SSGMC - Solar System Gold Mining Corp.
Now you're part of our family - colony 26168.
Your name is - Prisoner N57691.
Your task - participation in correctional work in the Oort cloud.
You're going to mine a gold! Gold from asteroids.
You will be given a spacesuit and a gun, but do not try to violate regime.
You will be sent into space without a spacesuit. And without a gun.
There is a lot of pirates in each region.
You have to destroy them all before you can return.
For this work you will get the money. Some of them you can spend on improving your equipment.
After release, you can spend it on alcohol and whores, as you wish.
We will give you a room on the space station with good views of the Neptune.
Work hard and you do not even notice how fast time will slip away!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32 and 64bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support (Pentium 4, Intel Atom, Athlon XP or highter) 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Welcome to the SSGMC - Solar System Gold Mining Corp. You're going to mine a gold! Gold from asteroids.
